about_the_game:
Jurassic Knights: Tactics is a turn-based tactical RPG that thrusts players into the heart of a meticulously crafted medieval fantasy filled with knights, guns and dinosaurs.

Traverse a vast and dynamic landscape, where choices abound at every turn. Chart your course across diverse regions, each harboring unique opportunities and challenges.





  • Recruit, train and equip your battalion on an individual basis.
  • Fight complex medieval turn-based tactical battles with equipment from WWI and companion dinosaurs.
  • Permadeath.
  • All characters come with their own background stories and traits. Will you recruit a shell-shocked trench runner, a profiteering munitions dealer, or a disgraced officer seeking redemption?
  • Expansive 16 class-system similar to Fire Emblem.
  • A plethora of equipment and loot.
  • A dynamic event system with atmospheric encounters and tough decisions outside of combat.
  • Achievement system for the individual and the collective army



When conflict erupts on the open world map, seamlessly transition to the tactical combat layer, in real-time where the true test of your strategic prowess awaits. Engage in intense turn-based battles, carefully positioning your units and exploiting enemy weaknesses. Utilize a wide array of weaponry, from swords and shields to advanced firearms, to outmaneuver and overpower your adversaries.



Do you have the strategic acumen and tactical mastery to lead your company to victory, securing a brighter future for the Solus Republic?

Jurassic Knights: Tactics is a turn-based tactical RPG that thrusts players into the heart of a meticulously crafted medieval fantasy filled with knights, guns and dinosaurs.

Traverse a vast and dynamic landscape, where choices abound at every turn. Chart your course across diverse regions, each harboring unique opportunities and challenges.

  • All characters come with their own background stories and traits. Will you recruit a shell-shocked trench runner, a profiteering munitions dealer, or a disgraced officer seeking redemption?
  • Expansive 16 class-system similar to Fire Emblem.
  • A plethora of equipment and loot.
  • A dynamic event system with atmospheric encounters and tough decisions outside of combat.
  • Achievement system for the individual and the collective army



When conflict erupts on the open world map, seamlessly transition to the tactical combat layer, in real-time where the true test of your strategic prowess awaits. Engage in intense turn-based battles, carefully positioning your units and exploiting enemy weaknesses. Utilize a wide array of weaponry, from swords and shields to advanced firearms, to outmaneuver and overpower your adversaries.



Do you have the strategic acumen and tactical mastery to lead your company to victory, securing a brighter future for the Solus Republic?
name: Jurassic Knights: Tactics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 4300 / Intel Core i5-3570K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 590 / GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

steam_germany.descriptors:
Drastische Gewalt
Derbe Sprache
Alkohol / Tabak

short_description: Jurassic Knights: Tactics is a turn-based tactical RPG. Navigate a sprawling campaign map, choosing your battles, accepting contracts, liberating settlements, and confronting foes. Optimize your soldiers to their maximum potential based on their backgrounds, traits and equipment.
